Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.

You want to contribute and help developing new features or want to extend existing? Feel free to open Fork and open a Pull Request!

This plugin was originally developed by r00telement but forked and continued by Pilzinsel64.
Punchline: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat.

Author: Infi, kalilistic
Name: PlayerTrack
Description:
PlayerTrack helps you keep a record of who you meet and the content you played together.
Organize players into categories, keep notes, and track them across name/world changes.
Customization options include colors, icons, nameplates, and alerts.
Punchline: Keep track of players you meet.

Author: perchbird
Name: PrefPro
Description:
Your character is personal, so you should be able to have NPCs refer to them
the way that you want. With PrefPro, you can control which text option
will appear when an NPC uses dialogue meant for a specific in-game gender.
This allows you to use a female player model and be referred to as male, and
vice versa. In addition, there are a few name customization options - if you
want to only be referred to by your last name, so be it.
Note: This plugin currently will not swap voiced cutscene dialogue.
Punchline: Changes in-game dialogue to reference your desired gender and name.

Author: Infi, kalilistic
Name: PriceCheck
Description:
To check prices, hold your keybind and then hover over an item or via the item's context menu.
The prices are pulled from the crowd-sourced site Universalis.
Punchline: Quickly price check your items.

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Price Insight
Description:
Whenever you mouseover an item, it will show you the NQ/HQ marketboard prices at the bottom as well as the most recent purchase.
Prices are retrieved from Universalis.app and cached for 90 minutes.
To refresh a price you can tap Alt while hovering over an item.
Punchline: See item marketboard prices on hover!

Author: Nightshade System
Name: PushyFinder
Description: A plugin that uses Pushover (https://pushover.net), Discord, or Ntfy (https://ntfy.sh) to send mobile push notifications when party members join or leave, or when a duty finder queue is initiated.
Punchline: Mobile push notifications for the Party Finder.

Author: spide-r
Name: PvPAnnouncer
Description:
This plugin will cause Metems voice lines to play mid-match upon specific conditions being met.

You must have Dawntrail installed & Voice Lines unmuted for this plugin to function!
Punchline: Do you want an announcer in your PvP Matches? Metem has offered to be of service!

Author: SaMo
Name: PvP Tracker
Description: Record, browse and filter your Crystalline Conflict, Frontline and Rival Wings match history, view match scoreboards and view aggregated statistics like win rate and average damage dealt per match.
Punchline: PvP match history and stats tracker.
Changelog: * Text alignment changes.

Author: UnknownX
Name: QoL Bar
Description:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.
Punchline: Customizable ImGui hotbars

Author: NightmareXIV, Chalkos
Name: QuestAWAY
Description: Removes unwanted icons from your map. Not only quests, any icons.
Punchline: Removes unwanted icons from your map.

Author: QuackieMackie
Name: QuestJournal
Description: Quest Journal is a detailed quest tracker / viewer. Letting you see information about quest chains without using a wiki.
Punchline: See details about quests that the FFXIV doesn't tell you.

Author: Anna, Azure Gem
Name: Quest Map
Description:
Explore quests and their rewards.
- Search for quest names or their rewards, including instances,
  beast tribes, minions, etc.
- See an interactive map of quest requirements and unlocks.
- Open a quest info window even for quests you haven't completed.
- Open quest starting locations on the map or open quests in the journal.

Icons: treasure map by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project and
locked book by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project
Punchline: Explore quests and their rewards.

Author: Era
Name: Quest Share
Description: Follow your friends on their questing journey by seeing their progress through a shared quest. Provides markers for quest destinations and (soon) teleporting features.
Punchline: Share your quest progress with others.

Author: XorelCodes
Name: Quiet The Den
Description: Auto-mute BGM while in the Wolves' Den, because I've had enough and it ends here.
Punchline: Stop yer ears bleedin' in the Wolves' Den

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Random Class Selector
Description: Allows you to select a random class to do dailies/etc on.
Punchline: Can't decide what class to work on today? Let the plugin decide for you!

Author: Fuwa Aika
Name: Razer Reader
Description: Select your installed version of Razer Synapse to automatically pull device battery levels from local log files
Punchline: Display the battery level of your wireless Razer devices

Author: Infi, PunishedPineapple
Name: Ready Check Helper
Description: Displays the names of the players that were not ready in chat following the completion of a ready check, and optionally adds ready check status icons over the party and alliance lists.
Punchline: Extends the game's built-in ready check.

Author: Cair
Name: Redirect
Description: Easily change the targeting priority for spells and abilities. Queue macros and ground-targeted actions! Type /redirect to configure.
Punchline: Simple mouseover and ground-targeting action integration

Author: 086, Anna
Name: Remote Party Finder Uploader
Description:
Uploads the PF listings you retrieve to the crowdsourced Remote
Party Finder website (https://xivpf.com/).
Punchline: Crowdsourced PF website (upload PF listings to xivpf.com)

Author: Chalkos
Name: RepairMe
Description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted.
Punchline: Never forget to repair & extract materia again!

Author: NotNite
Name: ReSanctuary
Description:
A plugin to improve Island Sanctuary. Features:

- Mark items to gather on the proper map
- Gathering & crafting todo-list, showing you what mats you require
- Widget for quick access to information

Icon from the Mutant Standard project.
Punchline: Improve your Island Sanctuary experience.

Author: Drahsid
Name: Resizable HUD
Description: Allows you to more freely and precisely scale and position HUD elements.
Punchline: Move and scale vanilla hud elements to your liking!

Author: perchbird
Name: ResLogger2.Plugin
Description:
ResLogger2 allows you to log paths that the game loads in a fast and convenient
window, with multiple options including only logging unique paths, path filters,
and uploading found paths. Information on the crowdsourced paths is available
at https://rl2.perchbird.dev.
Open the UI with /reslog.
Punchline: A path logger with optional crowdsourcing functionality.
Changelog:
Complete web server rework and increased reliability in the plugin.
- [Web only] Reworked the web server to further prevent hash collisions and include information from old game versions more accurately
- [Web only] Added new methods of obtaining crowdsourced path data from the web server.
- Reworked the database in the plugin to further prevent hash collisions.
- Added a stats window to the plugin, showcasing path progress for the current game version and the total amount of paths found.
- Added a new command to open the stats window.
- Added a new command to perform XIV's crc32 on a given string.
- Added a new tooltip to the path list window, showing the path's hashes.

Author: Populo
Name: Retainer Sales
Description: Quickly see which retainers have sold something while you were logged off.
Punchline: See retainer sales quicker

Author: Azure Gem
Name: Rezo Scale Plugin
Description:
Ever wanted to render at lower resolution? Now you can!
Only works with AMD FSR graphics upscaler
Punchline: Lower 3D Resolution Scale

Author: Ottermandias
Name: RezPls
Description:
Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who,
who is already resurrected,
and who has removable detrimental status effects in the world 
as well as in the group or alliance interface.
Punchline: Highlighting of Raises and detrimental status effects.

Author: Vielle Janlenoux
Name: RPP - Roleplay Profiles
Description: A plugin for roleplayers, displaying character profiles from Central Archives (centralarchives.org) and its regional RP portals, Chaos Archives (chaosarchives.org) and Crystal Archives (crystalarchives.org), for characters with the RP flag on.
Punchline: Display profiles from Chaos Archives, Crystal Archives, and Central Archives in-game

Author: ditzy
Name: Scout Helper
Description: A helper for generating scout tracker links for a-rank hunt trains
Punchline: A helper plugin for pre-populating hunt train scout tracker links

Author: Cytraen
Name: Seated Sidekick Spectator
Description: Adds chat or toast notifications whenever someone enters or exits your mount.
Punchline: Get notified when someone enters or exits your mount!
Changelog: - Update for 7.2

Author: Chirp
Name: SelfCare
Description: Configurable reminders to hydrate and maintain a healthy posture.
Punchline: Remember to check your posture!

Author: Era
Name: Shop Item Revealer
Description: Opens a window when speaking with a supported vendor, showing items that are not unlocked and what their conditions are. It checks quests, achievements, and reputation requirements.
Punchline: Shows you what items vendors won't sell you yet.

Author: Leon Aquitaine
Name: Sightseeingway
Description: Renames screenshots as they are created to include character name, map name, and coordinates. Monitors default, Reshade and GShade screenshots.
Punchline: Automatically rename your screenshots with character and location info.

Author: kalilistic, maintained by khayle
Name: SillyChat
Description:
Allows you to translate player and NPC chat messages/bubbles.
Supported languages include: Pirate, Urianger, Leet, Pig Latin, Turkey, Moogle & Chocobo.
Punchline: Make chat more fun with translations like pirate and urianger.

Author: Cyenia, 53m1k0l0n, rennerdo30
Name: SimpleCompare
Description: Show simple item comparison when pressing SHIFT and hovering over item
Punchline: Simple item comparison

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Map Tracker
Description: Utilizes an external server to share your current treasure hunt target with your party members.
Punchline: Automatically keep track of treasure hunt maps within your party.

Author: Elypha
Name: SimpleMarketBoard
Description:
A niche plugin designed to be user-friendly and multi-functional with rich customisation options, for power users.

Highlights:
  - Compact UI and user theme
  - Customisable search options
  - Rich ways for plugin interaction

Check out the 'Introduction' on Config Window for documentation.
Punchline: A simple and compact market board plugin for power users.

Author: Lunalicious
Name: Simple Todo
Description:
/ptodo to open the Todo List
/ptodoconfig to open the Configuration
Punchline: A simple Todo List

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks Plugin
Description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)
Punchline: This was supposed to be simple...

Author: Vielle Janlenoux
Name: Snooper
Description: Adds a /snooper command that shows a separate window that shows only messages from the player you're currently targeting. Useful for keeping track of different conversations during crowded RP events.
Punchline: See chat messages from your current target in a separate window.

Author: Sonar Team
Name: Sonar
Description: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure. Support is only provided in the Sonar Support discord.
Punchline: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays.
Changelog: See https://news.ffxivsonar.com for more information

Author: MidoriKami
Name: SortaKinda
Description: Sort your inventory however you want and keep it sorted.
Punchline: Total customization of your inventory

Author: Cytraen, Anna
Name: Sound Filter
Description:
Filters any sound or set of sounds from the game.

- Remove a battle sound effect you don't like
- Remove specific emote sounds
- Remove specific background music

Icons: filter by Kirby Wu from the Noun Project
and Sound by Gregor Cresnar from the Noun Project
Punchline: Filter any game sound.

Author: karashiiro
Name: SoundSetter
Description: A Dalamud plugin that allows volume control from anywhere, including gpose and cutscenes.
Punchline: A Dalamud plugin that allows volume control from anywhere, including gpose and cutscenes.

Author: Infi, VariableVixen
Name: StackSellPrice
Description: Shows the vendor sell price for the full stack of an item on the tooltip
Punchline: Because multiplication is hard.

Author: rekyuu
Name: Stanley Parable XIV
Description: Check /narrator for full options or use /narratorvolume to set volume manually.
Punchline: Witty commentary to the brilliant things you do.

Author: Olaren
Name: Status Contrast
Description: You will finally be able to easily see the timer of your buffs/debuffs properly when the arena background is bright!
Punchline: Add contrast to your status icons

Author: Chickenstew
Name: Stormtalons
Description: Gives the value of current targets health in Stormtalons from the dead game Wildstar.
Punchline: Gives the value of current targets health in Stormtalons from the dead game Wildstar.

Author: Infi
Name: Submarine Tracker
Description:
+ Tracker for current builds, routes and times 
+ Builder to improve, solve builds and optimize EXP
+ Configurable notification for return and repairs 
+ Helpy filled useful information
+ Custom loot overview with history and export
+ Multiple overlays to help with daily tasks 
+ Supports multiple FCs
Punchline: You do not talk about Fight Club, same for Submarines

Author: Glyceri
Name: Dialog Copy
Description:
Automatically copy ANY text on your screen.

There are two modes:
        -Normal Mode: Automatically copies a select number of text elements to your clipboard.
        -Text Copy Mode: This mode allows you to copy the text of ANY text element on the screen.

Default keybinds to toggle between the two modes are:
      [Left Control] [Left Shift] [Spacebar]
Punchline: Automatically copy ANY text on your screen by choice.

Author: Det
Name: Target Furniture
Description:
Currently, the only possible way to select a housing item is to click the furniture itself, and this can be a problem if you have multiple items close to each other.

This plugin adds a new option in the Housing Menu that targets the furniture for you
Punchline: You can now select furnitures from the Housing Menu
Changelog: 6.5 update

Author: Drahsid
Name: Target Lines
Description: Customizable target lines
Punchline: Customizable target lines

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Teamcraft List Maker
Description:
No more alt tabbing, no more writing down names of items, just add and export!

This plugin is not created by Teamcraft staff and they are not responsible for it. To report issues or request new features, please click the globe icon and submit them using the issues tab.

(Logo used with permission from Teamcraft owner)
Punchline: Adds a new menu when right clicking items that lets you easily add/remove items to a list and then export it to Teamcraft

Author: Pohky
Name: Teleporter
Description:
Adds Chat Commands to Teleport to Aetherytes or Areas by Name.
e.g. /tp Quarrymill or /tpm South Shroud
Supports setting up an Alias for Aetherytes to be used with Teleporter Commands
e.g. /tp home instead of /tp Estate Hall (Free Company)
Punchline: Chat Commands for Teleporting

Author: karashiiro
Name: TextToTalk
Description: Chat and game dialogue TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.
Punchline: Chat and game dialogue TTS plugin.

Author: Berna, kai
Name: Hit it, Joe! (Formerly TF2-ish Critical Hits Plugin)
Description:
* Set sounds and flavor text to be played/shown whenever you deal direct or critical damage or heal.
* Set sounds to be played when a countdown is in progress.
* Use different configurations by job.
* Use the game's SFX or your own custom WAV or MP3 files.
Punchline: Configure sounds for critical and direct hits, plus some countdown music.

Author: Anna, maintained by Khayle
Name: The Heart of the Party
Description:
The Heart of the Party is a remake of the in-game title picker, but it
supports searching. Note that it doesn't add a command to set your title; use
the built-in /title command instead.
Punchline: Set your character's title - now with Searchalin!
Changelog: API12 update. Added a Main UI callback so it can be used with Wotsit!

Author: Kurochi
Name: Tick Tracker
Description: Customizable bars that indicate the tick progress of HP/MP/GP regen
Punchline: Tracks the current tick for HP/MP/GP regen

Author: Nadya
Name: Tidy Chat
Description:
It is highly recommended to edit the default settings as you may disagree on which messages should be considered "spam"!

Provides granular filter options to filter nearly all game-related spam, leaving only important game messages in your chat.

  - Filters most spammy game messages
  - Blocks emote spam from other players
  - Condenses earned commendations into a single line
  - Shortens lengthy messages such as joining Novice Network or entering an instanced zone
  - Blocks repeated messages from appearing for a period of time
  - Automatically copies most 'with your chat mode in /say' quest dialogue to your clipboard
  - Write custom filters to Allow/Block messages!
  - And more!
Punchline: Better game messages and in-depth chat filters to keep a tidy chat.

Author: Meoiswa
Name: Tilted
Description: Automatically adjusts the Third Person Camera Angle/Distance given certain conditions.
Punchline: Tilt the camera, not yourself.

Author: Critical-Impact
Name: Tippy
Description:
Developed by goat for April Fools 2021 and unnecessarily resurrected by kal and adopted by Critical-Impact.

Handcrafted by our finest code artisans with special AI, 
he will analyze your playstyle to give you useful tips to get your GAMING to the next level.

Some things he can do:
* He can give general tips about the game
* He can give tips about the job you're playing
* He can report on your battle performance
* He will respect your feelings
Punchline: Tippy, your new FFXIV virtual assistant.

Author: attick, perchbird & Speedas
Name: Title Edit
Description:
Create your own custom title or character select screen of your favorite location in-game, and open the game right up to that spot every time.
Includes a number of preinstalled title and character select screen presets for you to use or get inspiration from, and an easy to use importer to use presets that others have shared!
Character select presets support recording your last visited location, per character display setting and even displaying yourself on a mount.
Punchline: Create, share, and shuffle custom title and character select screens for FFXIV.

Author: mabako, Liza Carvelli
Name: Title Roulette
Description: Allows you to pick any number of titles, setting a random one each time you use "/ptitle" or "/ptitle groupName".
Punchline: Pick titles you want in a title roulette.

Author: Stonewind
Name: Toastingway
Description: Displays new items, crystals, and gil as toasts.
Punchline: Keep on top of new items.

Author: Lore
Name: TooltipNotes
Description: Right-click any item in your inventory to start adding a note,or make a label in the config window to start adding your own labels
Punchline: A Plugin that lets you add notes to item Tooltips

Author: Anna, maintained by foophoof
Name: Tourist
Description:
Tourist adds a window to assist with the sightseeing log.

- Show when sightseeing log vistas are available
- Add markers for ARR vistas
- Open vista locations on your map
- Hide already completed or unavailable vistas
- Show the command needed for each vista

"sightseeing" icon by muhammad, from thenounproject.com CC BY 3.0
Punchline: Finish your sightseeing log.

Author: Tischel
Name: TPie
Description: Highly configurable hotbars that can be toggled with a keybind. They can be filled with Actions, Items, Gear Sets, Macros and more...
Punchline: Customizable ring-shaped hotbars
Changelog:
# 1.11.0.1

- Added support for Patch 7.2 and Dalamud API 12.

Author: Infi
Name: Tracky
Description:
### Normal Functions 
+ Track currency increase
+ Track teleport and npc repair costs
+ Track desynthesis results
+ Track retainer ventures

### Advanced  Functions
+ Track different coffer rewards
  - Venture Coffer
  - Materiel Container 3.0
  - Materiel Container 4.0
  - Sanctuary Materiel Container
+ Track Eureka bunny rewards
+ Track Eureka/Bozja lockboxes
Punchline: Tracking data is fun

Author: MgAl2O4
Name: TriadBuddy
Description:
Triple triad solver, NPC matches only.
- highlights next move during mini game
- evaluates all deck presets before match
- deck optimizer for NPC
- adds more details to card collection window
Punchline: Triple triad solver

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Twitch XIV
Description: Allows you to join a Twitch chat and send messages and (optionally) have the twitch chat come through your chatbox.
Punchline: Sup y'all? It's ya boy, Twitch XIV, and today we're gonna be playing some final fantasy fourteen.

Author: Una
Name: Umbra XIV
Description: Consolidates common UI elements and actions into a single uniform interface in the form of a set of highly customizable toolbars.
Punchline: Adds fully customizable toolbars and 3D world markers to the game.

Author: LittleNightmare
Name: Used Name
Description: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname base on SocialList. Right click on the target to add/sub/check the used names and nickname.
Punchline: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname

Author: Jrogo
Name: Venue Manager
Description: Save and share venues you visit or own. Get updates and logs for visitors coming and going. Guest list management tools for venue owners to view and easily export it for use with other applications. Icon by Silv :)
Punchline: Bookmark the venues you visit. View and manage guests for venues.

Author: ocealot
Name: VFXEditor
Description: VFX, animation, and sound editing plugin. Icon by PAPACHIN
Punchline: VFX editor and viewer

Author: SheepGoMeh
Name: Visibility
Description:
Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp
Punchline: Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.

Author: Noevain
Name: Voice Director
Description: Changes your VO language by specifying a language and an instance, your language will revert to the default when you exit. Icon designed by Leremy from Flaticon
Punchline: Changes your VO language on a per-duty basis

Author: Asriel
Name: Waitingway
Description:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login, duty, and roulette queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue time estimates and notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it into the game, as well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your queue times to crowdsource information about FFXIV server load and activity. Join our Discord for more information!

Discord URL: https://waiting.camora.dev/discord
Punchline: Set out for Dawntrail and make your queues a breeze. Waitingway provides crowdsourced FFXIV login queue times, now with Discord queue notification features.

Author: Fuwa Aika
Name: Wave Wrangler
Description: Literally all this plugin does is send "o/" in chat if you accidentally type "/o"
Punchline: Never mess up your wave emoticon again!

Author: Infi, PunishedPineapple
Name: Waymark Preset Plugin
Description: Allows you to save, edit, place, import, export, and preview an unlimited number of waymark presets.
Punchline: Improved Waymark Management

Author: rail
Name: WDIGViewer
Description: Displays strategy images for encounters. Use /wdig to open.
Punchline: View encounter strategy images.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Weatherman
Punchline: Allows precise control over time and weather per zone or globally.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Say What?
Description: Prints NPC speech bubbles to the chat log.  Please check the plugin settings and your chat log filters to make sure that they are compatible with each other.
Punchline: Persistent NPC Flavor Text

Author: MidoriKami, cas-c
Name: Where am I again?
Description: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in up in the corner next to the server and time info. Open config with /waia.
Punchline: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in next to the server info.

Author: Megurt
Name: Which Mount
Description: Adds a 'Mount Search' option to the target's context menu, displaying mount information and acquisition details in the chat. Also includes a searchable mount database with detailed navigation.
Punchline: Check what mount someone is using and browse the full mount collection.

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Which Patch Was That?
Description:
Whenever you mouseover an item, the tooltip will show you the patch the item was released in.
Never carry around old useless crafting materials again!
Punchline: Quickly check the patch an item was released in!

Author: spide-r
Name: Who Did That?
Description:
This plugin can track the following actions:
- Rescues
- Healing actions
- Status/Buff Application
- Cleanses 
- Heals
- Mitigation
- Provoke
- Shirk

These will be logged in your chat when they are used on your character.
Punchline: Actively logs healing, cleanses, buffs, and more. Finally figure out who rescued you.

Author: Blooym
Name: Wholist
Description:
Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft

Features:
- Minimalistic interface that can be scaled down to become part of your HUD.
- Player context menu items for examining, searching on the Lodestone and more.
- Customizable colours & behaviour.
- Random adventure plate command
- Display nearby player count in the server info bar

Please note this plugin will automatically disable functionality in PvP.
Punchline: Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft.

Author: ash
Name: Who's Talking
Description:
Once installed, join a Discord voice channel and an XIV party, and have people put their character names in their Discord nicknames (or configure things manually in the plugin settings). You should get colourful outlines around the job icons on the party list: green for talking, blue for muted, red for deafened, and yellow for unknown name.

Note that you'll get a permission prompt mentioning "StreamKit Overlay" – this is expected.

Some icons by Google, Apache 2.0.
Punchline: See Discord voice activity indicators directly on your party list.

Author: in1tiate
Name: Wikilinx Rightclicks
Description: Never forget how to get an item again! Just right-click, and *gobbie-BOOM!* Integrates with any community wiki as well as the official Eorzea DB.
Punchline: FFXIV Wiki and Eorzea DB context menu integration

Author: Azure Gem, herulume
Name: Window Title Changer
Description: Allows you to change your game window title
Punchline: Change your game window titie

Author: daemitus, MidoriKami
Name: ezWondrousTails
Description: This plugin prints the probability of getting a row in Wondrous Tails to the in-game display along with the average probability of what would happen if you shuffled.
Punchline: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.

Author: Mythic Palette
Name: Wordsmith
Description: Wordsmith is a text editor with roleplayers in mind. It automatically breaks your text up for easy copy/paste, has advanced features, spellcheck, and even a thesaurus.
Punchline: A roleplay thesaurus and scratch pad.

Author: HappySprite
Name: Workshop Optimizer Plugin
Description: Use /wso after you visited your island.
Punchline: Optimize Island Sanctuary Workshop orders.

Author: Khloe Leclair
Name: WTSync
Description: WTSync keeps uses an external server to keep track of the duties in your Wondrous Tails book. When you're in a party, and other players in the party are also using WTSync, you can open a UI to see which duties everyone needs at once in one convenient list.
Punchline: View a list of all the Wondrous Tails duties shared by your party.

Author: Attick, daemitus, maintained by Khayle
Name: XIV Combo
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu
Punchline: PvP, but in PvE!

Author: Callum Carmicheal (with help from Aida Enna)
Name: The Great Controller HUD Switcher
Description: A simple tool to automatically switch between keyboard and controller hud's when pressing WASD or moving the left joystick. You can setup a macro to add the actions to your hotbar.
Punchline: Toggle controller / mouse mode automatically or with commands.

Author: Kaz Wolfe
Name: XIVDeck
Description:
This plugin allows players to use an Elgato Stream Deck as a virtual utility hot bar. Actions are called directly, meaning there is no need to set up awkward keybinds, custom macros, or any other settings.

Note that the XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin must also be installed for this plugin to be useful. You can download the Stream Deck plugin from the linked GitHub repository, under the "Releases" section.

Please report all problems to KazWolfe#2896 in the Dalamud Support server or by opening an Issue on GitHub.
Punchline: Turn your Elgato Stream Deck into a hotbar!

Author: Glyceri
Name: Fatal Frame
Description: Takes a screenshot upon death (and other events).
Punchline: Takes a screenshot upon death (and other events).

Author: Violet Stardust
Name: XivGearExport
Description:
A plugin that allows easy export of your gearsets to xivgear.app in edit or view mode. Also includes the ability to export your gearsets from the gearset list.

Use /xivgearexport or /xge to export your current gear set.
Punchline: A simple utility that allows easy export of your gearsets to xivgear.app.

Author: Infi, Cadaeix
Name: XIVLogger
Description: Save chat logs as text files from when this is loaded. /xivlogger for settings, /savelog to save logs, /copylogs to copy logs.
Punchline: Save chat logs to your computer as text files or copy them!

Author: Khayle, daemitus, attick
Name: XIV Uncombo
Description: This plugin splits combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto several buttons. For example, a 1-1-1 combo would become 1-2-3.
Punchline: Splits combos into more button for more button bloating. Requires BLU spells.

Author: AlexCSDev
Name: XIVWindowResizer
Description:
Set your game window to arbitrary size not limited by your display resolution. Mostly useful for taking high-resolution screenshots without going fullscreen and using DSR/FSR.
Requires borderless or windowed mode.
Punchline: Game window resizing plugin. Ever wanted to take 8K screenshots on 144p screen? Now you can.

Author: Zeffuro
Name: ZDs
Description: Show when cooldowns come off cooldown in an intuitive way!
Punchline: ZeeDees, bring the Zs to your Ds!

Author: daemitus, hiroa, MidoriKami
Name: ZodiacBuddy
Description: This plugin attempts to help you complete your Zodiac weapon in various ways.
Punchline: Complete your Zodiac relic with style.

Author: rail
Name: AetherBreakout
Description: A Breakout clone to play during queue times.
Punchline: A classic arcade game.
Changelog:
Version 1.2.0.1:
- Features:
  - Added sfx, music, audio controls.
  - Enhanced paddle collision physics.
- Bug Fixes:
  - Fixed power-up icons to mismatch the effects.
  - Fixed an issue where power-up effects were not resetting correctly.
  - Fixed the ball speed setting not being applied at the start of a new game.

Author: Cytraen, yomishino
Name: Aether Compass
Description:
This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Eureka Elementals (by apetih)
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Island Sanctuary Gathering Objects and Animals
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
Punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs

Author: SalvatoreDevelopment
Name: AetherFM
Description:
In-game radio streaming for Final Fantgitasy XIV. Enter a stream URL and listen to your favorite radio!

Note: AetherFM is only supported on Windows. Due to its reliance on the NAudio library, audio playback is not available on Linux or non-Windows versions of Dalamud.
Punchline: Listen to radio in Eorzea!

Author: Critical-Impact
Name: Allagan Tetris
Description: A not so faithful recreation of the legendary game.
Punchline: Even the Allags had time to burn!

Author: Sohtoren
Name: Altoholic
Description: Get gils, currencies, inventory and retainers items from all your characters
Punchline: Informations about your alts

Author: silasary
Name: ArchipelagoXIV
Description: Key Item Randomizer for FFIXV
Punchline: Client for the Archipelago Multiworld Randomizer.

Author: Rietty
Name: AutoMammet
Description: Provides an easy copy and pastable CSV format you can use for island sanctuary spreadsheets. Provides options to export the popularity, future popularity and the current cycle's demand and shift values. Both as words and as numbers on a scale of -2 to 2. This plugin does not provide any calculations for Island Sanctuary, merely an export option for your ingame data.
Punchline: Provides an easy copy and pastable CSV format you can use for island sanctuary spreadsheets.

Author: Mienna
Name: Beachcomber
Description:
This solver examines your Island Sanctuary data (including your Isleventory!) to provide recommendations to maximize your Seafarer's Cowrie earnings.

Made in collaboration with the Overseas Casuals.
Punchline: Determines the most profitable agenda for your Island Sanctuary workshop each cycle

Author: Loody
Name: BetterFriendList
Description:
Friend list but with better sorting, can search by name, refresh with a button, color names..
Right click for context menu.
Punchline: SE friend list sucks.

Author: NotNite, harbingerftw
Name: Better in Blue
Description: Allows you to save, load, and share infinite Blue Mage spell loadouts and hotbars.
Punchline: Infinite Blue Mage spell loadouts.

Author: Lynesth
Name: Better Targeting System
Description: A more intelligent targeting system for the game which also includes new keybinds.
Punchline: A more intelligent targeting system for the game.

Author: clepix21
Name: Blackjack Casino
Description:
A plugin to play blackjack just like in a real casino.
Enjoy an authentic casino experience directly in Final Fantasy XIV.
Punchline: Play blackjack in FFXIV!
Changelog: Version initiale du plugin Blackjack avec interface moderne et fonctionnalités complètes.

Author: Nagi'to Atreides
Name: Casexile
Description: Lets you use any in-game slash command without worrying about capitalization. Whether you type "/action", "/ACTION", "/AcTiOn" or any variation thereof, the plugin ensures the intended action takes place without wasting your time.
Punchline: Case-Insensitive Slash Commands

Author: Arrest Everybody
Name: ChatEmoteColor
Description: A simple plugin that recolors emote chat lines depending on who is executing the emote and their target.
Punchline: Recolors emote lines in chat.

Author: Guerzoniansus, Karou
Name: Clean Hunt Chat
Description:
Hides shouts and yells, unless they contain flag coordinates or 'switching instance' messages.
Use /cleanhunt to turn on for a configurable amount of time (default 1 hour).
Use /cleanhunt off to disable early.
Punchline:
No more cringe during hunt trains.
Temporarily filters away Shouts and Yells that don't contain a flag or an instance message.

Author: Aelexe
Name: Coin Pouch
Description: Currency alerts and convenient teleports.
Punchline: Currency alerts and convenient teleports.
Changelog:
Release v0.0.1.1
-- Features
- Updated for Dalamud API 7
- Updated currencies and currency caps for patch 6.2

Author: foophoof
Name: Collector's Anxiety
Description: Collector's Anxiety helps completionists or players with a hobby for collecting in-game things keep track of what they do or don't have in an easy-to-use checklist format. Data is loaded live from the game, so collection statuses are updated in real-time.
Punchline: Hey guys, Famous YouTuber here. Do you ever get Collector's Anxiety?

Author: TheThirdDoor
Name: Conditional Tweaks
Description:
Lets the user change game settings based on the character's state.
Do you want to keep you weapon out in dungeons?
Do you want BGM to always be on for cutscenes?
Do you want the world to turn purple when you jump?
Then this is the plugin for you!

 In fact here are the rules you'll need for that last thing (copy and import them one at a time).
Rule(Miounne's standard directive | AccessibilityColorBlindFilterEnable 1/0 conditions({Jumping, True} ))
Rule(Kan-E-Senna's shoddy golden rule | AccessibilityColorBlindFilterType 3/0 conditions({Jumping, True} ))

Not available in pvp.
Punchline: Tweaks and options based on the charactor's state.

Author: Koizumi
Name: Craft Remaining
Description: A simple plugin that displays how much progress and quality is remaining for your craft, without having to do the maths! Great to use in conjunction with Calculations or SimpleTweaks Improved Crafter Tooltips.
Punchline: A simple plugin that displays how much progress and quality is remaining for your craft.

Author: 0x0ade
Name: CustomResolution
Description: Basic plugin that allows you to specify a custom resolution.
Punchline: Enforces a custom resolution for the game, similar to NVIDIA DSR.

Author: Munn
Name: DaCoblyn
Description: Translate tools that allow you to communicate with foreign friend that you doesn't know what they're saying.
Punchline: Speak to your Japanese friend!

Author: Noevain
Name: Dot Calculator
Description: Show as FlyText or chat prints how much damage the current DoT you have put on the target has dealt
Punchline: Show how much damage your DoTs have dealt so far

Author: dechamps-chen
Name: Dot Position
Description: Dot Position adds a simple, customizable marker under your character to show your precise hitbox location.
Punchline: "See exactly where you stand."

Author: Eidolon
Name: Dynamic UI Scaling
Description: Automatically finely scales the game UI by resolution.
Punchline: Automatically finely scales the game UI by resolution.

Author: SamuelSapp
Name: Fast Waymarks
Description: Fast waymarks with settings for common configurations. Rotate and resize with a handy preview window.
Punchline: For when you want to spend time fighting the boss, not fiddling with waymarks.

Author: Cometo
Name: Gamba
Description:
A simple plugin for casino dealers to easily manage all their player's bets and 
quickly getting the payout of each round to keep the gambing going.
Punchline: Let's go gambling!

Author: ItsBexy
Name: Gauge-O-Matic
Description: Gauge-O-Matic allows you to customize your job gauges by adding extra counters, bars, and indicators in a variety of styles
Punchline: Enhance and customize job gauges.

Author: Chivalrik
Name: GentleTouch
Description:
You need to configure patterns and triggers before it will work, 
open the configuration window to do that. 
DS5 is currently unsupported. 
Currently supported triggers are:
- Cooldowns
- Near Aether Current
Punchline: Create vibration patterns for the controller and specify triggers to make it vibrate.
Changelog:
- feat: DualSense support via DS4 compatibility vibrations
- feat(DualSense): Set resistance for Adaptive Triggers
- feat(DS+DS4): Two extra macro buttons:
  Create (DualSense) / TouchPad (DualShock4) as Individual Macro #96,
  PS Button as Individual Macro #97
- feat: Option to /draw & /sheathe with PS button instead of Macro #97

Check out the new settings tab, if you are using a DualSense/DualShock4.

Author: DragonFlyy
Name: GlamourWishlist
Description: Create and manage lists of items that you want to save for glamouring later. Right-click context menus on items can be used to quickly add an item to a list.
Punchline: Create wish lists of items you want to glamour

Author: Cytraen
Name: Handy Hotbar Helper
Description: Shows a window next to the Actions & Traits menu when your hotbars are missing actions.
Punchline: Helps show what actions are missing from your hotbars.

Author: KiwiKahawai
Name: Hotbar Helper
Description: Helps keep hotbars in sync with available actions. Particularly useful if you've lost your configuration, or transfer between platforms regularly.
Punchline: Keeps your hotbars up to date

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Hotbar Unlimited
Description: Allows you to move each individual hotbar slot to wherever you want, however you want.
Punchline: Total control over where to put your hotbar slots.

Author: Fuwa Aika
Name: Housing Herald
Description: Upon login, reminds you if it's the entry period and you haven't bid on a house yet. If you have bid, get reminders to check the plot once the results period comes around!
Punchline: Automatic house bidding reminders!

Author: MaryUsagi
Name: HUD Layout Helper
Description:
Allows you to use keyboard shortcuts in the HUD Layout Editor, like Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V to copy and paste the position of individual HUD elements, and Ctrl+Z and Ctrl+Y to undo and redo changes. 

Can also display an overlay showing alignment to other elements with Ctrl+R.
Punchline: Adds QoL features to the native HUD layout editor: Undo, Redo, Copy, Paste and alignment lines.

Author: nebel (prev. ascclemens, Necoji)
Name: HUD Manager
Description:
- Save infinite HUD layouts
- Edit your HUD with precision
- Automatically swap between HUD layouts based on conditions
- Make child layouts that only affect desired HUD elements
- Change visibility of job gauges
- Export and import layouts from text
Punchline: Take total control over your HUD.

Author: Azure Gem
Name: I Hate Caps Lock
Description:
SORRY CAPS
Remove caps lock when pressing the Enter / Return key.
This plugin contains no configuration.
Punchline: Don't you hate CAPS LOCK so much?

Author: Infi
Name: Inspecto
Description: A simple plugin that keeps a history of people you inspected.
Punchline: Look back at that cute search comment even hours later~

Author: Asriel
Name: Item Icons
Description: Display custom icons for items for easier inventory mangement.
Punchline: Works perfectly out of the box! Use /ii to configure.

Author: BitsOfAByte
Name: Kiko Guide
Description:
Comprehensive guides for duty content such as Dungeons, Trials and Alliance Raids.

Key features:
- Automatically open a guide when entering a duty
- Neat user interface that scales well at small sizes
- A short-text mode for easier reading & accessibility
- Anti-spoiler protections by default
- Built-in guide editor
- Integrations with your favourite plugins
& more to come!
Punchline: The ultimate guidebook for in-game duties, great for sprouts & doing your daily roulettes!

Author: MidoriKami
Name: KitchenSync
Punchline: When level sync'd, make skills you don't have access to more transparent

Author: athene
Name: Launchpad Hotbars
Description: A plugin that allows you to map hotbar actions to a novation launchpad. /lphb to open config.
Punchline: A plugin that allows you to map hotbar actions to a novation launchpad

Author: Azure-Agst
Name: FATE/Map Gil Tracker
Description:
This plugin aims to simplify gil tracking for FCs who use FATEs/Maps as fundraising events!
Simply install it, enable it, and it'll automatically track every chest or sack opened and calculate how much gil each person owes.
Punchline: A Plugin to track gil earned from FATEs or Treasure Maps!

Author: Zhyra
Name: Market Uploader
Description: Uploads market data to market.xivhub.org and other configurable aggregators.
Punchline: Uploads market data to market.xivhub.org and other configurable aggregators.

Author: NotNite
Name: Moonbase Omega
Description: Plays chat messages sent in Cosmic Exploration via DECtalk (the TTS used in Moonbase Alpha).
Punchline: Adds Moonbase Alpha TTS when in Cosmic Exploration. aeiou!

Author: Samuelka
Name: Mount Collectioner
Description: A plugin allows you to track received mounts by character.
Punchline: Plugin for track collected mounts

Author: Jen Hyul
Name: Mount Radio/Mount Music Player
Description: /radiosettings, /radiotoggle, /radiovolume, /radioautostart, /radioautostop
Punchline: URL music player for your mounts! Stream internet radio when on a mount or on foot.

Author: 53m1k0l0n, Gotest
Name: Mouse Target Tooltip
Description: A plugin that shows a tooltip for mouseover targets.
Punchline: Shows a tooltip with a little information for characters that the mouse is over.

Author: Pistachio Herald
Name: MyPF
Description: Replaces <mypf> with your current PF listing. Macro friendly.
Punchline: Replaces <mypf> with your current PF listing. Macro friendly.

Author: Arcadia
Name: Ntfynder
Description: A plugin that uses Ntfy (https://ntfy.sh/) to send mobile push notifications when party members join or leave, or when a duty finder queue is initiated. Forked from PushyFinder.
Punchline: Mobile push notifications for the Party Finder. Alternative to PushyFinder without need for paid app or any hastle

Author: Mokocup
Name: Occult Crescent Helper
Description: Automatically notifies about FATE, CE or Aurora Mirage in Occult Crescent related content.
Punchline: Wake up baby, It's touch grass time

Author: Sl0nderman
Name: Ocean Fishin'
Description:
Automatically recommends bait to use based on your ocean fishing route. 
You'll get suggestions for spectral fish, fisher's intuition buff, and missions.
Punchline: Suggests bait for ocean fishing.

Author: darkarchon, KiwiKahawai
Name: Oh gee, CD
Description:
OGCD assistant providing Text To Speech, (Custom) Sound Effects and unlimited extra bars to visualize and alert you for your OGCDs.

This is an early version and things might still break.
Punchline: oGCD helper

Author: InvoxiPlayGames
Name: Paggles
Description: Changes the time in the Server Bar to use the system locale for AM/PM designation.
Punchline: My Final Fantasy XIV says paggles right next to the time, what does this mean?

Author: pyrite_radio
Name: Party List Extras
Description: Adds Text and Icons next to the party list describing active buffs. Still missing some jobs - See github for progress. Please note the overlay goes to the left of your party list.
Punchline: Parses Buffs to help understand what your party is doing.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Party List Layout
Description: Customize the layout of the party list.
Punchline: Customize the layout of the party list.

Author: Rietty
Name: Party Sort+
Description: Sort your party list according to a series of rules built on top of the game's default system. Allowing you to specify based off Duty Instances and Jobs!
Punchline: Never worry about sorting your party again!

Author: Chirp
Name: Pathfinder
Description: A tool for visually locating any model path in the game world.
Punchline: Visualizer for nearby model paths. Adds +5 to perception.

Author: Tanker Tanker(aka Nvrnight)
Name: Party Finder Search Plugin
Description:
/pf
/pf on
/pf off

This plugin allows you to search for parties based on their descriptions. When you refresh the party finder, if any parties meet your search criteria, a notification sound will play and a link to each party will be displayed in the chat window.

This plugin will NOT automatically scan PF for you, it only runs additional search logic when you hit the refresh button.
Punchline: Find party finder groups easier.

Author: iri
Name: Photobooth
Description:
Take your portrait & adventurer plate game to the next level with this companion panel for the portrait editor.

• Rewind, fast forward, and step through animations frame by frame.
• Adjust character head and eye direction without moving the camera.
• Position camera and pivot point with a top-down map.
• More intuitive controls for lighting color and angle.
Punchline: Advanced controls for portraits & adventurer plates.

Author: Sevii
Name: Better Housing
Description: An improved housing experience. Furniture selection based on what you see, keybinds to switch modes and toggle counter and snap.
Punchline: Furniture selection that actually works properly

Author: isaiahcat
Name: Quest Tracker
Description: Easily track quest completion
Punchline: For the quest completionist

Author: 53m1k0l0n, srkizer
Name: Quote of the Lobby
Description: Displays a random dialogue, and/or the datacenter you'll be connecting to when you press GAME START.
Punchline: Simmer does the light before every login.

Author: Abyeon
Name: Racingway
Description: A simple plugin for timing, logging, and ranking player times for your jumping puzzles!
Punchline: Time your jumping puzzles!

Author: Karou
Name: Render Adjust
Description: Allows you to dynamically adjust the in-game setting for rendered objects by FPS (and GPU Usage if you're on windows) and allows you to set a custom number of rendered objects manually. Uses GPU usage and FPS on Windows, and FPS only on Wine.
Punchline: Dynamically adjust your object rendering settings.

Author: Ibcrootbeer
Name: Retainer Alerts
Description: A simple plugin to remind you when your retainers are done with their ventures.
Punchline: Reminds you about retainer ventures.

Author: Meoiswa
Name: RPBlurb
Description: Realtime Roleplay sheets
Punchline: Realtime RP bios

Author: Kass
Name: RP Utils
Description: A suite (eventually) of features to support roleplay. Currently only the sonar. /rputils
Punchline: Supporting your RP needs.

Author: apetih
Name: RTyping
Description: Allows other people using this plugin to see your typing status when in the same party.
Punchline: Let people know when you r typing.

Author: Hattu
Name: SAMMI Webhook Plugin
Description:
Sends game data SAMMI via webhook, allowing users to automate OBS actions such as playing effects, transitions, sounds, etc. based on in-game events.
Requires SAMMI and OBS to function. See https://sammi.solutions or the plugin's readme on GitHub.
/psammi to configure.
Punchline: OBS automation based on game events via SAMMI webhooks

Author: Blooym
Name: Settings Enhanced
Description:
Settings Enhanced allows you to create zone-specific system and character configurations; For example, you could lower the amount of rendered players in Limsa, or mute other players sound effects while in stellar crafting zones. Your original configuration data is stored and automatically re-applies when entering an area with you have not created zone setting for, or when disabling the plugin/closing the game.

It is recommended that you create regular backups whilst using this plugin incase something does does break - upon install a check will be ran to see if at least one system/character configuration backup has been created; You will not be able to use the plugin if until you have created one.
Punchline: Per-zone system and character configurations

Author: ash
Name: Show Gear
Description:
Normally the Fitting Room defaults to showing you just the piece of gear you’re trying on. This plugin inverts that behaviour: when you launch the game, the Fitting Room (plus Item Dyeing and Glamour Plate Selection) will show all your gear by default.

NB: there are some oddities to how Item Dyeing and Glamour Plate Selection behave when this plugin is doing its thing. If you’d rather it not touch those windows at all, there’s an option for that (and more details about the problem) in the settings.

Icon adapted from OpenMoji, CC BY-SA 4.0.
Punchline: Shows your gear in the Fitting Room by default.

Author: spide-r
Name: SoundEffectMuter
Description:
This plugin silences all text sound effects and quick chat while in PvP zones including the Wolves Den.
No Configuration needed! Just install and forget.

For feedback, please contact .spider in the Dalamud discord.
Punchline: Quiets the PvP Experience.

Author: Berna
Name: Team Fortress Fantasy
Description:
* Show a Win Panel (with sounds!) when you clear or get wiped in a duty.
* Show a TF2-style timer while in a duty.
* Enable the "Voice Lines" module (via /tfconfig) to have voice lines play when certain conditions are met. What conditions, you ask? It's a surprise! (Unless you uncheck the "Surprise me!" box.)
* More features maybe soon?

Note: This plugin uses files from a local Team Fortress 2 installation.
It'll search for the game's installation folder in all configured Steam Library Folders automatically.

Without a TF2 install, the Timer and Win Panel will work with FF XIV fonts, and no voice line will work.
Punchline:
[REQUIRES TF2 INSTALLED FOR MOST FEATURES] The Mann Brothers just found a deposit of gravel in Eorzea
and hired YOU, Mercenary of Light, to help them FIGHT for it.

Author: eja-git
Name: TheDot
Description: A dot to mark players hitbox
Punchline: A dot to mark players hitbox.

Author: mkalash
Name: Vanilla Hotbar Extender
Description: Allows you to use commands to save the actions in a hotbar and then load them into any other hotbar. Like the vanilla "/hotbar copy" command, but unlimited, without taking up other hotbars to save the actions.
Punchline: Save and load actions into hotbars without taking up extra job hotbars.

Author: Marethyu
Name: Where's my mouse
Description:
Add UI element on top of the mouse like circle to keep track of your mouse location during gameplay.
Open settings with /wmm
Punchline: Allows you to not lose track of your mouse on the screen

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Who am I again?
Description: Shows how you are in the server info bar.
Punchline: Ever forget who you are? We can fix that!

Author: perappu
Name: Who Said What Now
Description:
Chat history plugin, view history per character, per group, or search.
 Main command /whowhat
Punchline: Chat history plugin, view history per character, per group, or search.
Changelog:
* v0.6.3
 * add sound notifications
* v0.6.2
 * fix font weirdness from ImGui using ImRaii

Author: darkarchon
Name: XIVJitterFix
Description:
With the release of 7.0 SquareEnix has implemented several temporal antialiasing solutions. However they all have a severe bug that affects image quality significantly.
This plugin will restore using jitter when talking to NPCs or in cutscenes and gpose. Jitter (not noticeable micromovements of the camera) is necessary for temporal antialiasing solutions (DLSS, DLAA, TSCMAA+jitter) to work properly.
For some reason, SquareEnix decided we don't need jitter during the time where the game benefits from using it the most.
Punchline: Fixes SquareEnix' botched antialiasing implementation

Author: Marulu, StreetRat
Name: XIVR - VR Mod
Description:
Mod to allow vr. Requires SteamVR Not the steam version of the game
** Requires SteamVR **
Please click the globe icon for detailed instructions.
Chat/FAQ: flat2vr.com
Punchline: Mod to allow VR
